Summary / Title: Access Sifu Guide as a Freemium User
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to Discover page.
2. Click on the blue "View Sifu Guide" card.
Expected Result:
The system should display the Freemium Sifu Guide content only.
Premium Sifu videos should not be accessible to a freemium user.
Actual Result: The system displays Premium Sifu Guide videos despite the user being logged in as a freemium user.

Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the application on a mobile browser (Chrome / Safari).
2. Log in with a valid user account.
3. Navigate to the Profile section.
4. Open or tap on the Password field.
5. Observe the text displayed in the Password section.
Expected Result: The text in the Password field should be clearly visible, properly aligned, and readable, with no overlapping on the mobile browser.
Actual Result: Issue on the mobile browser, when navigating to the Profile section and opening the Password field, the text appears overlapped, making it difficult to read.

Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to KFQ sifu scroll
2. Go to any Blog
Expected Result: Text that is intended to be displayed in bold should appear correctly in bold formatting, clearly highlighting important content and improving readability.
Actual Result:
Text content that is intended to appear in bold formatting is not displayed in bold. As a result, important information is not visually distinguished as expected, which affects readability and content clarity.

Note: The content appears in Bold after a refresh

Summary / Title: Application does not redirect to Home page when clicking the logo after using Search
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Login to the application.
2. Enter a keyword in the search bar.
3. Click on the Search button / press Enter.
4. After search results are displayed, click on the application logo.
Expected Result: User should be redirected to the Home page when clicking the application logo.
Actual Result: User is not redirected to the Home page after clicking the application logo.

Summary / Title: Search filter displays irrelevant videos too when scrolling through search results
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Login to the application.
2. Click on the search filter.
3. Enter a keyword (e.g., “water”) in the search bar.
4. View the initial search results.
5. Scroll down the search results list.
Expected Result: Only videos relevant to the searched keyword (“water”) should be displayed throughout the entire search results list.
Actual Result: Initially, relevant “water” videos are displayed, but when scrolling down, unrelated videos appear in the search results.

Summary / Title: Verify Freemium Sifu Guide video reflects the latest platform enhancements
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
"1. Log in to the platform using a Freemium user account.
2. Navigate to the Dashboard.
3. Click on Sifu Guide.
4. Open any Freemium Sifu Guide video.
5. Observe the platform features and UI demonstrated in the video."
Expected Result: The Freemium Sifu Guide video should display updated content reflecting the latest platform enhancements and current UI/feature set.
Actual Result: The Freemium Sifu Guide video displays outdated platform enhancements, showing the old version of the platform.

Summary / Title: Dojos page keeps loading when re-clicking the Dojos sidebar icon
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Click on the “Dojos” icon in the left sidebar to load the Dojos page.
2. Wait until the Dojos page is fully loaded.
3. Click on the “Dojos” icon again to refresh or re-open the same page.
Expected Result: The Dojos page should either remain stable without reloading or refresh once and load successfully without entering a continuous loading state.
Actual Result: The Dojos page enters a continuous loading state and does not complete loading when the Dojos sidebar icon is clicked again.

Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to any course.
2. Open a lesson that contains an End of Lesson Quiz (ELQ).
3. Start and attempt the ELQ that doesn't have IE on the video. eg: 1.01
4. Submit the quiz with a score below 80% (for example, 60–70%).
5. Observe the message displayed related to Instant Explanation.
Expected Result:
The message should display:
“Score at least 80% to get Instant Explanation.

The video, which does not contain IE, the message should appear as 
"No instant explantion available for this video'
Actual Result:
There is a visual issue in the Android app where the message incorrectly states “at least 50% to get Instant Explanation” instead of the correct requirement of “80% to get Instant Explanation.”
 Please note that this is only a display issue—functionally, the system correctly requires users to score at least 80% when attempting an ELQ.
Additionally, there is a content-related issue: this message is being displayed on ELQs where Instant Explanation (IE) is not available at all.
 In such cases, the message should instead read:

3. Observe the screen behavior.

Actual Result: The screen flickers for a few seconds when clicking on Video Challenges or Quiz Challenges before the filtered content is displayed.

Summary / Title: Back button requires multiple clicks after repeated Dojos navigation
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to Dojos.
2. Click on Video Challenges → All.
3. Repeat the same navigation multiple times (e.g., 5 times).
4. Click on Quiz Challenges.
5. Click on Dojos when there are 0 dojos.
6. Click on Dojos again without making any changes.
7. Click the Back button.
Expected Result: The Back button should navigate to the previous page with a single click.
Actual Result: The Back button must be clicked multiple times to navigate back, corresponding to the number of repeated navigations.

Summary / Title: Refreshing the page after unlocking the question
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Click on any Subjects within Get One answer a day
2. Unlock Any question
Expected Result: After clicking “Unlock Answer”, the tutor credit should be deducted and the unlocked answer should be displayed immediately without requiring a page refresh.
Actual Result: After the user clicks on Unlock Answer, the tutor credit is deducted successfully; however, the UI does not update immediately. The unlocked answer is not displayed unless the page is refreshed, and the system continues to prompt the user to unlock the answer again.

Summary / Title: Any first question should be free every day
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Click on any Subjects within Get One answer a day
2. Unlock Any question

Expected Result: Any first question that is attempted to unlock answer should be unlocked for free
Actual Result: Is asking 5 TC for the first question attempted on a new day

Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to Teaching Resources section.
2. Select a specific subject using the subject filter toggle.
3. Observe the eBook listing area.
4. Switch the filter back to “All Subjects”.
5. Observe the eBook listing area again.
Expected Result: When a specific subject is selected, the relevant eBook information should load and display correctly in the Teaching Resources section. Additionally, when the filter is switched back to “All Subjects,” all available eBook content should reload and be displayed properly.
Actual Result: When a specific subject is selected from the Teaching Resources section, the eBook information does not load and the content area appears blank. Furthermore, after switching the filter back to “All Subjects,” the eBook listings still do not display, and the section remains empty instead of showing the available content.

Description / Steps to Reproduce: 1. Click on "Past Papers" from the Navbar or the footers.
Expected Result: The Past Papers page should load smoothly without delays or performance issues.
Actual Result: The page loads but is noticeably laggy and slow to respond.

Summary / Title: Help Center footer logo does not redirect
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Click on "Help Center" from the footer.
2. On the Help Center page, click on the footer logo.
Expected Result: Clicking the footer logo should redirect the user to the top of the Help Center page.
Actual Result: The footer logo does not redirect anywhere and no action occurs.

Summary / Title: Drag Words Into Box challenge stops functioning after being minimized
Description / Steps to Reproduce: 1. Attempt the "Drag Words Into Box" Challenge
Expected Result: The “Drag Words Into Box” challenge should function properly even after being minimized and reopened, with full drag-and-drop capability maintained.
Actual Result: When the “Drag Words Into Box” challenge is minimized and then accessed again, the drag-and-drop functionality does not work as expected.

Summary / Title: Next Question Not Scrolling to Top
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Navigate to Mock Exams.
2. Start/attempt the quiz.
3. Scroll down on a long question.
4. Click Next to proceed to the following question.
Expected Result: When navigating to the next question, the page should automatically scroll to the top of the new question.
Actual Result: After clicking Next, the system loads the next question but maintains the previous scroll position, keeping the user at the bottom of the page instead of the top.

Summary / Title: Answer Disappearance after unlocking the question
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Click on any Subjects within Get One answer a day
2. Unlock Any question
Expected Result: Once the user unlocks the daily answer, it should remain visible and accessible for the entire valid duration (as per the feature rules). The unlocked answer should not disappear initially.
Actual Result: In the “Get One Answer a Day” feature, the unlocked answer disappears unexpectedly after being displayed initially. Even though the user has successfully unlocked the answer, it is no longer visible, which may cause confusion and uncertainty about whether the daily unlock was applied.

Summary / Title: Mail not received after purchasing the package
Description / Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to Premium Package
2. Purchase any package
3. Go to Gmail and observe if the mail appears
Expected Result: After purchasing the premium package, the user should receive a confirmation email with subscription details, and the system should notify the user successfully about the purchase.
Actual Result: After purchasing the premium package (stage), no confirmation email is received. The system displays a message like “You have subscribed to the Package of Interactive Videos package,” but email notification is missing.
